name: GPT-4.1 mini
description: GPT-4.1 mini matches or exceeds GPT-4o in intelligence while reducing latency by nearly half and cost by 83%. Features extended context and fast response times.
notes: Excellent balance of performance and cost with 1 million token context window. Nearly 50% faster than GPT-4o while maintaining comparable intelligence. Supports 75% discount for cached inputs.
